title: ModelLevelOfDetail
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.

name: ModelLevelOfDetail
type: enum
summary: |
  Controls the level of detail for Class.Model|Models in experiences with
  instance streaming enabled.
description: |
  Controls the level of detail for Class.Model|Models in experiences with
  instance streaming enabled.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Automatic
    summary: |
      Default behavior, currently equivalent to Disabled.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: StreamingMesh
    summary: |
      A lower resolution "imposter" mesh (colored, coarse mesh that wraps around
      all child parts of the model) renders outside the streaming radius.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Disabled
    summary: |
      A lower resolution mesh will not be displayed.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: SLIM
    summary: |
      A Scalable Lightweight Interactive Model, or SLIM, model (a composite of
      all child parts of the model) renders at progressively lower resolutions
      at distances based on the streaming radius. Greatly improves visual
      quality over StreamingMesh.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
